titleStmt.title: Davids deliverance and thanksgiving. A sermon preached before the King at VVhitehall upon June 28. 1660. being the day of solemn thanksgiving for the happy return of His Majesty. By Gilbert Sheldon, D.D. and Dean of His Majesties Chappell Royall. Published by His Majesties speciall command.
titleStmt.author: Sheldon, Gilbert, 1598-1677.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Timothy Garthwait, at the little north door of S. Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Title page in red and black.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
